original_text: When a bullock, or a sheep, or a goat, is brought forth, then it shall be seven days under the dam; and from the eighth day and thenceforth it shall be accepted for an offering made by fire unto the Lord.
korean_text: 수소나 양이나 염소가 나거든 이레 동안 그것의 어미와 같이 있게 하라 여덟째 날 이후로는 여호와께 화제로 예물을 드리면 기쁘게 받으심이 되리라

sentences.original_text: When a bullock, or a sheep, or a goat
then it shall be seven days under the dam;
sentences.korean_translation: 어미 낳은 지 칠 일 동안 있어야 하며

sentences.original_text: and from the eighth day and thenceforth
it shall be accepted for an offering made by fire
